profile.en:
The diligent secretary of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

A hard-working stickler for rules and regulations, she does her best to contribute to the revitalization of Abydos High School.
profile.jp:
アビドス高等学校所属、対策委員会の真面目な書記担当。

原則と規則を重視するタイプの女の子。アビドス高等学校の復興のため、ひたむきに努力している。

desc.en: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.jp: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.thai: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.ko: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.zh_tw: 擊敗頭盔團重返阿拜多斯高中的對策委員會學生們，再次向老師自我介紹。在老師的幫助下，學校的補給問題已順利解決，這讓學生們非常開心。大夥們想趁勢破壞片方頭盔團的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.en: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone was amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduced themselves. Hoshino proposed to engage their outpost and Sensei agreed.
desc.jp: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone was amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduced themselves. Hoshino proposed to engage their outpost and Sensei agreed.
desc.thai: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone was amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduced themselves. Hoshino proposed to engage their outpost and Sensei agreed.
desc.ko: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone was amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduced themselves. Hoshino proposed to engage their outpost and Sensei agreed.
desc.zh_tw: 在擊退頭盔圈後，眾人對老師剛剛的指揮感到讚歎不已；之後眾人分別介紹了自己。星野此時提出要去襲擊頭盔圈的前哨基地，老師表示同意，眾人立刻出發。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己。星野此时提出要去袭击头盔圈的前哨基地，老师表示同意，众人立刻出发。

desc.en: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.jp: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.thai: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.ko: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.zh_tw: 老師聽說阿拜多斯高中欠下的債務超過9億日圓，僅靠學生 的力量。光是償還利息就喘不過氣。老師雖想幫忙學生，但是茜香卻生氣地表示自己信不過大人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生 的力量。光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生 的力量。光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生 的力量。光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。

desc.en: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.jp: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.thai: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.ko: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.zh_tw: 回到學校後，眾人向老師道謝，卻不小心說出了還債一事。茜香表示對老師不太信任，因而不太願意討論這個話題，選擇離開，日步美跟隨前往。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。茜香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，日步美跟随前往。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。茜香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，日步美跟随前往。

desc.en: From what the Hoshino and Ayane said, Sensei acknowledged the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knew that sandstorms kept happening in recent years, and no efforts were achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school put into it. As no banks were willing to lend them money, they were forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only went worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students had left the school.

Sensei also knew that sandstorms kept happening in recent years, and no efforts were achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school put into it. As no banks were willing to lend them money, they were forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only went worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students had left the school.

desc.zh_tw: 從星野和綾音口中，老師獲知了阿拜多斯欠下9億6235萬元債務的事情，並且得知阿拜多斯地區近年經常發生沙塵暴，學校雖投入大量資金卻仍無法逆轉；由於沒有銀行願意為他們貸款，他們不得不轉向高利貸公司，但沙漠化越來越嚴重，債務水漲船高，償還無望，導致很多學生離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 从星野和绫音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。

desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.thai: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.ko: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_tw: 老師和對策委員會學生們跟蹤茜香，來到她打工的拉麵店。大家吃了拉麵度過愉快的時光，可是茜香依然一副沒好氣的樣子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被頭盔團綁架。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.

desc.zh_tw: 老師帶著對策委員會的其它人來到了茜香打工的拉麵店，茜香大為震撼。然後，茜香帶領大家就坐；之後，野乃美主動提出結賬，但老師最終還是用大人的卡片結了賬。吃飽後，大家在茜香的難堪與強烈要求下返回了學校。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
